net.truelicense.spi.io

Interface BIOS

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardBIOS

    public interface BIOS
    A Basic Input/Output System (BIOS). Implementations need to be stateless.
    Author:
    Christian Schlichtherle

    • Method Summary

      • pathStore

        Store pathStore(Path path)
        Returns a store for the given path.

      • resource

        Source resource(String name,
                Optional<ClassLoader> classLoader)
        Returns a source which loads the resource with the given name. If the given class loader list is empty, then the resource gets loaded as described in ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream(String). Otherwise, the resource gets loaded as described in ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream(String) using the first class loader in the list.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the resource to load.
        classLoader - The optional class loader to use for loading the resource. If no value is present then the system class loader gets used.
        Returns:
        A source which loads the resource with the given name.

      • stdin

        Source stdin()
        Returns a source which reads from standard input without ever closing it.

      • stdout

        Sink stdout()
        Returns a sink which writes to standard output without ever closing it.

      • systemPreferencesStore

        Store systemPreferencesStore(Class<?> classInPackage,
                             String key)

      • userPreferencesStore

        Store userPreferencesStore(Class<?> classInPackage,
                           String key)
        Returns a store for the user preferences node for the package of the given class and the given key.
